system.description: When you go to your benefactor for help or resources, roll with your Status.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, they reveal you overlooked something that greatly injured their Status; they are determined to remind you of their power over you before they even consider your request.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: On a hit, they get you what you need, provided you offer prophetic insight into a problem they have right now.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value:
On a hit, they get you what you need, provided you offer prophetic insight into a problem they have right now.

On a 10+, the support they give is exceptionally useful.
